between_IN November_NNP and_CC May_NNP According_VBG to_TO 2005_CD the_DT population_NN of_IN Saudi_NNP Arabia_NNP is_VBZ 26.4_CD million_CD which_WDT also_RB includes_VBZ 5.6_CD million_CD foreigners_NNS ._.

In_IN 1954_CD &#44;_CD the_DT Ministry_NNP of_IN Education_NNP was_VBD established_VBN and_CC its_PRP$ first_JJ Minister_NNP was_VBD King_NNP Fahad_NNP Bin_NNP Abdul_NNP Aziz_NNP ._.
Presently_RB &#44;_CD Saudi_JJ Arab_JJ &#39;_CD s_PRP Education_NNP system_NN has_VBZ 8_CD Universities_NNS &#44;_CD more_JJR than_IN 24_CD thousand_CD schools_NNS &#44;_CD thousands_NNS of_IN colleges_NNS and_CC various_JJ educational_JJ and_CC training_NN institutes_NN ._.

Indonesia_NNP &#39;_CD s_PRP national_JJ motto_NN &#44;_CD ``_`` Bhinneka_NNP Tunggal_NNP Ika_NNP ''_'' -LRB-_-LRB- ``_`` Unity_NNP in_IN Diversity_NNP ''_'' literally_RB &#44;_CD ``_`` many_JJ &#44;_CD yet_RB one_CD ''_'' -RRB-_-RRB- &#44;_CD articulates_VBZ the_DT diversity_NN that_WDT shapes_VBZ the_DT country_NN ._.

The_DT country_NN is_VBZ richly_RB endowed_VBN with_IN natural_JJ resources_NNS &#44;_CD yet_RB poverty_NN remains_VBZ widespread_JJ in_IN contemporary_JJ Indonesia_NNP ._.
The_DT name_NN Indonesia_NNP derives_VBZ from_IN the_DT Latin_NNP Indus_NNP &#44;_CD and_CC the_DT Greek_JJ nesos_NNS &#44;_CD meaning_NN ``_`` island_NN ''_'' -LRB-_-LRB- 6_CD -RRB-_-RRB- The_DT name_NN dates_VBZ to_TO the_DT 18th_JJ century_NN &#44;_CD far_RB predating_VBG the_DT formation_NN of_IN independent_JJ Indonesia_NNP ._.
In_IN 1850_CD &#44;_CD George_NNP Earl_NNP &#44;_CD an_DT English_JJ ethnologist_NN Indonesians_NNPS put_VBD the_DT Conditions_NNS for_IN Archipelago_NNP Melanesians_NNPS Dutch_NNP academics_NNS writing_VBG in_IN East_NNP Indies_NNP publications_NNS were_VBD reluctant_JJ to_TO use_VB Indonesia_NNP ._.

His_PRP$ property_NN was_VBD even_RB more_JJR than_IN Hideyoshi_NNP &#39;_CD s_PRP family_NN ._.

Japan_NNP &#39;_CD s_PRP overseas_RB wars_NNS After_IN the_DT establishment_NN of_IN a_DT powerful_JJ army_NN and_CC inspired_VBN by_IN western_JJ imperialism_NN &#44;_CD expansionist_NN ideas_NNS once_RB again_RB started_VBD to_TO take_VB root_NN among_IN the_DT Japanese_JJ ._.

According_VBG to_TO some_DT &#44;_CD traditionally_RB they_PRP should_MD stay_VB with_IN China_NNP whereas_IN some_DT wanted_VBD to_TO establish_VB relations_NNS with_IN Japan_NNP and_CC Germany_NNP In_IN the_DT Chin_NNP era_NN &#44;_CD the_DT Chinese_JJ Government_NN fought_VBN against_IN Britain_NNP in_IN the_DT opium_NN war_NN of_IN 1839-42_CD and_CC 1856-1869_CD ._.
It_PRP also_RB fought_VBD against_IN France_NNP from_IN 1884_CD to_TO April_NNP 1885_CD and_CC as_IN aresult_NN China_NNP had_VBD become_VBN weaker_JJR &#44;_CD and_CC the_DT poiltical_JJ restrictions_NNS from_IN the_DT West_NNP could_MD not_RB be_VB stopped_VBN Perhaps_RB it_PRP was_VBD a_DT big_JJ advantage_NN for_IN Japan_NNP to_TO stop_VB China_NNP &#39;_CD s_PRP influence_NN and_CC power_NN over_IN the_DT Korean_JJ peninsula_NN ._.
This_DT led_VBD to_TO a_DT heavy_JJ loss_NN of_IN resources_NNS &#44;_VBP the_DT government_NN was_VBD unable_JJ to_TO repay_VB their_PRP$ loans_NNS &#44;_CD unable_JJ to_TO manage_VB the_DT finances_NNS as_IN turned_VBN bankrupt_JJ &#44;_CD hence_RB was_VBD unable_JJ to_TO manage_VB the_DT army_NN a_DT military_JJ mutiny_NN and_CC riot_NN broke_VBD out_RP in_IN Seoul_NNP ;_: troops_NNS &#44;_CD assisted_VBN by_IN the_DT population_NN &#44;_CD sacked_VBD the_DT rice_NN granaries_NNS there_RB ._.

Japan_NNP did_VBD not_RB like_IN this_DT act_NN and_CC tension_NN rose_VBD to_TO a_DT pitch_NN when_WRB the_DT Chinese_JJ Government_NN while_IN informing_VBG Japan_NNP of_IN the_DT decision_NN dispatched_VBD 2800_CD troops_NNS at_IN the_DT request_NN of_IN the_DT Korean_JJ Emperor_NNP to_TO help_VB crush_VB the_DT Tunghak_NNP rebellion_NN ._.

On_IN 8th_JJ June_NNP a_DT Japanese_JJ force_NN of_IN 8000_CD troops_NNS captured_VBN the_DT Royal_NNP Palace_NNP and_CC removing_VBG the_DT Emperor_NNP installed_VBD the_DT pro-Japanese_JJ elements_NNS in_IN power_NN ._.
The_DT new_JJ government_NN forced_VBD the_DT Chinese_JJ forces_NNS to_TO leave_VB Korea_NNP while_IN at_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN Japan_NNP moved_VBD more_RBR troops_NNS into_IN the_DT country_NN ._.
Due_JJ to_TO the_DT effective_JJ and_CC timely_JJ investigation_NN by_IN Japan_NNP &#44;_CD it_PRP gained_VBD the_DT upper_JJ hand_NN &#44;_CD and_CC as_IN a_DT result_NN of_IN the_DT agreement_NN of_IN Shimonosiki_NNP &#44;_CD Korea_NNP got_VBD independence_NN from_IN China_NNP ._.
Japan_NNP received_VBD the_DT authority_NN to_TO occupy_VB the_DT islands_NNS of_IN Taiwan_NNP and_CC Pescadoris_NNP &#44;_CD and_CC to_TO construct_VB a_DT Naval_NNP base_NN on_IN the_DT southern_JJ end_NN of_IN Manchuria_NNP ._.

According_VBG to_TO this_DT agreement_NN if_IN Russia_NNP was_VBD to_TO attack_VB any_DT of_IN the_DT countries_NNS &#44;_VBP the_DT other_JJ country_NN would_MD support_VB it_PRP in_IN order_NN to_TO defend_VB their_PRP$ sovereignity_NN Both_DT countries_NNS agreed_VBD to_TO not_RB sign_VB any_DT kind_NN of_IN agreement_NN with_IN Russia_NNP ._.

The_DT event_NN that_WDT took_VBD place_NN on_IN Shanghai_NNP &#39;_CD s_PRP Marco_NNP Polo_NNP Bridge_NNP is_VBZ also_RB ranked_VBN among_IN the_DT causes_NNS of_IN this_DT war_NN ._.

On_IN 31st_CD January_NNP 1945_CD the_DT American_JJ army_NN landed_VBD on_IN south_JJ Luzon_NNP and_CC advanced_VBD towards_IN Manila_NNP ._.

The_DT was_VBD the_DT second_JJ air_NN attack_NN on_IN Japanese_JJ land_NN after_IN the_DT Doolittle_NNP air_NN attack_NN of_IN April_NNP 1942_CD &#44;_CD which_WDT was_VBD the_DT proper_JJ start_NN of_IN the_DT strategic_JJ bombardment_NN campaign_NN on_IN Japan_NNP ._.

Actually_RB these_DT islands_NNS were_VBD under_IN Japan_NNP &#39;_CD s_PRP control_NN and_CC in_IN May_NNP 1943_CD &#44;_CD Admiral_NNP Ernest_NNP King_NNP of_IN American_NNP Navy_NNP sugguested_VBD to_TO conquer_VB them_PRP ._.
With_IN the_DT passage_NN of_IN time_NN the_DT sense_NN of_IN occupation_NN of_IN America_NNP started_VBD to_TO strengthen_VB ._.
building_VBG a_DT runway_NN for_IN 29_CD planes_NNS on_IN these_DT islands_NNS will_MD make_VB the_DT attacks_NNS easy_JJ ._.
Therefore_RB on_IN 11th_JJ June_NNP 1944_CD &#44;_CD continuous_JJ aerial_JJ and_CC ground_NN attacks_NNS were_VBD done_VBN on_IN these_DT islands_NNS from_IN all_DT sides_NNS ._.
According_VBG to_TO an_DT estimate_NN 3000_CD American_NNP and_CC 24000_CD Japanese_NNS were_VBD killed_VBN in_IN this_DT war_NN that_WDT continued_VBD for_IN weeks_NNS ._.
America_NNP occupied_VBD three_CD islands_NNS till_IN 23rd_JJ July_NNP and_CC on_IN the_DT island_NN of_IN Saipan_NNP ._.

And_CC when_WRB Salebis_NNP got_VBD there_EX they_PRP found_VBD nothing_NN but_CC mounds_NNS of_IN bricks_NNS ._.
In_IN the_DT meantime_NN sultan_NN started_VBD preparations_NNS for_IN the_DT defense_NN of_IN Baitul_NNP Muqadas_NNP as_IN the_DT next_JJ target_NN of_IN the_DT Silvians_NNPS was_VBD Baitul_NNP Muqadas_NNP ._.
Sultan_NN with_IN his_PRP$ small_JJ army_NN fought_VBN with_IN a_DT huge_JJ army_NN with_IN great_JJ courage_NN and_CC vigor_NN ._.

The_DT Christians_NNS gained_VBD nothing_NN from_IN this_DT Crusade_NN apart_RB from_IN the_DT city_NN of_IN Akra_NNP ._.
Richard_NNP the_DT Lionheart_NNP was_VBD very_RB impressed_JJ by_IN Sultan_NNP &#39;_CD s_PRP generosity_NN and_CC bravery_NN ._.

During_IN the_DT Third_NNP Crusade_NN &#44;_CD Saladin_NNP proved_VBD that_IN he_PRP was_VBD the_DT most_RBS powerful_JJ ruler_NN in_IN the_DT world_NN ._.
Salahuddin_NNP was_VBD a_DT brave_VB and_CC generous_JJ person_NN ._.
During_IN wars_NNS &#44;_CD he_PRP treated_VBD the_DT Christians_NNS so_RB well_RB that_IN they_PRP still_RB remember_VBP him_PRP today_NN He_PRP really_RB liked_VBD war_NN so_RB much_RB that_IN once_RB he_PRP had_VBD a_DT mole_NN on_IN his_PRP$ bottom_NN due_JJ to_TO which_WDT he_PRP could_MD not_RB sit_VB and_CC eat_VB ._.

The_DT group_NN with_IN the_DT best_JJS Pakistan_NNP Urdu_NNP news_NN channel_NN is_VBZ express_JJ News_NN ._.
Usually_RB &#44;_CD the_DT batsman_NN hits_VBZ the_DT ball_NN with_IN his_PRP$ bat_NN and_CC runs_VBZ towards_IN his_PRP$ partner_NN ._.

For_IN the_DT victory_NN the_DT chasing_NN team_NN should_MD hit_VB more_RBR runs_VBZ &#44;_CD but_CC if_IN all_DT their_PRP$ 10_CD players_NNS lose_VBP their_PRP$ wickets_NNS then_RB the_DT opposition_NN team_NN will_MD win_VB ._.
Bat_NN used_VBN in_IN the_DT game_NN of_IN Cricket_NNP ._.
Cricket_NN was_VBD invented_VBN in_IN England_NNP as_IN a_DT result_NN of_IN which_WDT it_PRP reached_VBD to_TO all_PDT the_DT occupied_JJ states_NNS during_IN the_DT colonial_NN system_NN of_IN England_NNP ._.

How_WRB to_TO play_VB cricket_NN How_WRB to_TO play_VB cricket_NN the_DT aim_NN of_IN batting_NN team_NN is_VBZ to_TO make_VB most_RBS runs_VBZ One_CD run_NN completes_VBZ when_WRB both_DT players_NNS reach_VBP or_CC touch_VBP their_PRP$ bat_NN on_IN the_DT wicket_NN of_IN other_JJ side_NN of_IN him_PRP Batsman_NNP can_MD run_VB any_DT time_NN after_IN the_DT ball_NN is_VBZ bowled_VBN Runs_NNS are_VBP also_RB scored_VBN when_WRB the_DT batsman_NN hits_VBZ the_DT ball_NN beyond_IN the_DT boundary_NN line_NN Example_NN :_: 4_CD runs_NNS are_VBP scored_VBN when_WRB the_DT ball_NN crosses_VBZ the_DT boundary_NN line_NN after_IN bouncing_VBG withtin_NN the_DT field_NN of_IN play_NN and_CC 6_CD runs_NNS are_VBP scored_VBN when_WRB the_DT ball_NN crosses_VBZ the_DT boundary_NN without_IN bouncing_VBG -LRB-_-LRB- jpg_NN -RRB-_-RRB- Total_JJ runs_NNS scored_VBN by_IN batting_NN team_NN can_MD be_VB increased_VBN in_IN these_DT ways_NNS when_WRB bowler_NN 1_CD -RRB-_-RRB- ._.
Bowls_NNP the_DT Ball_NNP which_WDT is_VBZ beyond_IN the_DT reach_NN of_IN a_DT batsman_NN ._.
-LRB-_-LRB- This_DT is_VBZ called_VBN wide_JJ or_CC out_IN going_VBG ball_NN -RRB-_-RRB- 2_LS -RRB-_-RRB- ._.

-LRB-_-LRB- This_DT is_VBZ called_VBN no_DT ball_NN &#44;_CD and_CC if_IN bowler_NN bowls_VBZ no_DT ball_NN in_IN one_CD day_NN match_NN then_RB batsman_NN gets_VBZ a_DT free_JJ hit_NN on_IN which_WDT batsman_NN can_MD not_RB be_VB given_VBN out_RP -RRB-_-RRB- ._.
3_LS -RRB-_-RRB- ._.
Ball_NNP hits_VBZ the_DT pad_NN of_IN batsman_NN and_CC during_IN this_DT batsman_NN score_NN runs_NNS -LRB-_-LRB- This_DT is_VBZ called_VBN leg_NN bye_NN &#44;_CD these_DT runs_NNS are_VBP not_RB counted_VBN in_IN batsman_NN account_NN -RRB-_-RRB- 4_LS -RRB-_-RRB- ._.
Ball_NNP passes_VBZ without_IN touching_VBG any_DT thing_NN and_CC during_IN this_DT batsman_NN score_NN runs_VBZ This_DT is_VBZ called_VBN bye_NN &#44;_CD these_DT runs_NNS are_VBP not_RB counted_VBN in_IN batsman_NN account_NN -RRB-_-RRB- These_DT runs_NNS are_VBP called_VBN extra_JJ runs_NNS The_DT white_JJ area_NN above_IN the_DT balls_NNS surface_NN used_VBN in_IN test_NN cricket_NN is_VBZ called_VBN the_DT seam_NN In_IN English_NNP &#44;_CD the_DT white_JJ embossed_JJ line_NN on_IN the_DT ball_NN is_VBZ called_VBN seam_NN ._.
Ball_NNP used_VBD in_IN test_NN cricket_NN &#44;_CD Embossed_NNP white_JJ color_NN stripeis_VBZ called_VBN Seam_NNP in_IN english_JJ There_EX are_VBP many_JJ ways_NNS to_TO do_VB it_PRP &#44;_CD for_IN example_NN ball_NN hitting_VBG the_DT wickets_NNS and_CC falling_VBG of_IN bails_NNS etc._FW Bowlling_VBG team_NN can_MD also_RB get_VB batsman_VB out_RP by_IN hitting_VBG the_DT ball_NN with_IN both_DT hands_NNS Batsman_NNP can_MD be_VB out_RP by_IN ten_NN different_JJ methods_NNS ._.
Bowler_NNP can_MD deliver_VB six_CD balls_NNS at_IN a_DT time_NN &#44;_CD it_PRP is_VBZ called_VBN an_DT over_RB ._.
More_JJR than_IN six_CD balls_NNS can_MD be_VB delivered_VBN in_IN an_DT over_IN if_IN the_DT bowler_NN delivers_VBZ a_DT no_DT ball_NN or_CC a_DT wide_JJ ball_NN ._.
After_IN one_CD over_IN the_DT ball_NN is_VBZ thrown_VBN from_IN the_DT other_JJ side_NN of_IN the_DT wicket_NN ._.
When_WRB a_DT batsman_NN gets_VBZ out_RP &#44;_CD another_DT player_NN of_IN the_DT team_NN comes_VBZ to_TO bat_NN ._.
During_IN the_DT one_CD day_NN match_NN all_DT players_NNS can_MD bat_NN for_IN only_RB one_CD time_NN &#44;_CD in_IN test_NN match_NN both_DT teams_NNS can_MD bat_NN twice_RB ._.
One_CD time_NN batting_NN is_VBZ called_VBN Innings_NNS in_IN English_NNP After_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT innings_NNS batting_NN team_NN come_VBN out_RP to_TO bowl_VB and_CC bowling_VBG team_NN come_VBN out_RP to_TO bat_NN And_CC in_IN test_NN match_NN one_CD innings_NNS ends_VBZ when_WRB all_DT ten_NN players_NNS gets_VBZ out_RP &#44;_CD or_CC the_DT batting_NN side_NN team_NN ends_VBZ up_RP their_PRP$ innings_NNS &#44;_CD which_WDT called_VBN in_IN English_NNP declare_VBP ._.
The_DT total_JJ runs_NNS of_IN the_DT team_NN is_VBZ called_VBN score_NN ._.
Suppose_VB a_DT team_NN makes_VBZ 280_CD runs_NNS in_IN 50_CD overs_NNS at_IN the_DT loss_NN of_IN 6_CD wickets_NNS then_RB it_PRP is_VBZ written_VBN as_IN 280\/6_CD -LRB-_-LRB- 50_CD overs_NNS -RRB-_-RRB- At_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN both_DT innings_NNS the_DT team_NN with_IN highest_JJS score_NN is_VBZ the_DT winner_NN The_DT results_NNS of_IN the_DT match_NN For_IN more_RBR see_VB Results_NNS If_IN all_PDT the_DT ten_NN players_NNS of_IN a_DT team_NN get_VB out_RP before_IN reaching_VBG the_DT required_JJ score_NN then_RB this_DT is_VBZ written_VBN as_IN :_: Team_NNP lost_VBN by_IN ``_`` N_NNP ''_'' runs_VBZ where_WRB ``_`` N_NNP ''_'' stands_VBZ for_IN the_DT remaining_VBG runs_NNS ._.
If_IN the_DT team_NN achieves_VBZ its_PRP$ score_NN before_IN all_DT ten_NN of_IN its_PRP$ wickets_NNS fall_VBP then_RB it_PRP is_VBZ written_VBN like_IN this_DT &#44;_CD team_NN won_VBN by_IN &#39;_CD n_NN &#39;_CD wickets_NNS &#44;_CD where_WRB &#39;_CD n_NN &#39;_CD is_VBZ the_DT number_NN of_IN wickets_NNS left_VBD In_IN Test_NNP Match_NNP &#44;_CD when_WRB team_NN &#39;_CD s_PRP both_DT innings_NNS total_VBP scores_NNS are_VBP less_JJR than_IN the_DT score_NN of_IN the_DT first_JJ batting_NN team_NN &#44;_CD then_RB they_PRP write_VBP :_: Team_NNP defeated_VBN by_IN an_DT innings_NNS and_CC &#39;_CD N_NNP &#39;_CD runs_NNS wherein_VBP &#39;_CD N_NNP &#39;_CD means_VBZ the_DT balance_NN runs_VBZ being_VBG not_RB scored_VBN ._.
In_IN a_DT one_CD day_NN match_NN if_IN at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT game_NN the_DT scores_NNS of_IN both_DT teams_NNS are_VBP the_DT same_JJ then_RB it_PRP is_VBZ called_VBN a_DT &#39;_CD tie_NN &#39;_CD And_CC in_IN a_DT test_NN match_NN if_IN after_IN the_DT stipulated_VBN time_NN &#44;_CD the_DT game_NN is_VBZ still_RB carrying_VBG on_IN and_CC there_EX is_VBZ no_DT result_NN &#44;_CD then_RB it_PRP is_VBZ called_VBN a_DT draw_NN In_IN this_DT situation_NN a_DT complicated_JJ term_NN comes_VBZ into_IN play_NN which_WDT is_VBZ called_VBN the_DT Duckworth_NNP Lewis_NNP system_NN Through_IN which_WDT way_NN they_PRP calculate_VBP a_DT new_JJ modified_VBN runs_NNS to_TO be_VB scored_VBN ._.
For_IN complete_JJ rules_NNS see_VBP :_: Rules_NNS of_IN cricket_NN ._.
For_IN cricket_NN there_EX are_VBP 42_CD rules_NNS which_WDT were_VBD formulated_VBN by_IN Melbourne_NNP cricket_NN club_NN These_DT laws_NNS were_VBD prepared_VBN in_IN conjunction_NN with_IN cricket_NN playing_VBG nations_NNS and_CC the_DT International_NNP Cricket_NNP Council_NNP Players_NNPS and_CC Management_NNP One_CD team_NN consists_VBZ of_IN eleven_JJ players_NNS who_WP are_VBP divided_VBN in_IN 4_CD groups_NNS ._.
-LRB-_-LRB- 1_CD -RRB-_-RRB- Batsmen_NNPS &#44;_CD -LRB-_-LRB- 2_LS -RRB-_-RRB- Bowlers_NNPS &#44;_CD -LRB-_-LRB- 3_LS -RRB-_-RRB- All_DT Rounder_NNP &#44;_CD -LRB-_-LRB- 4_LS -RRB-_-RRB- Wicket_NNP keeper_NN In_IN a_DT balanced_JJ team_NN there_EX are_VBP usually_RB 4_CD batsmen_NNS &#44;_CD one_CD or_CC two_CD all_DT rounders_NNS &#44;_CD 4_CD bowlers_NNS and_CC one_CD wicket_NN keeper_NN ._.
From_IN these_DT one_CD person_NN is_VBZ called_VBN the_DT captain_NN and_CC the_DT rest_NN follow_VB his_PRP$ instructions_NNS During_IN the_DT match_NN there_EX are_VBP two_CD umpires_NNS in_IN the_DT field_NN ._.
One_CD upmire_NN stands_VBZ at_IN the_DT end_NN from_IN where_WRB the_DT bowler_NN delivers_VBZ the_DT ball_NN Important_JJ decisions_NNS of_IN the_DT match_NN like_IN giving_VBG out_RP &#44;_CD giving_VBG no_DT ball_NN or_CC wide_JJ ball_NN are_VBP the_DT umpire_NN &#39;_CD s_PRP responsibility_NN ._.
The_DT second_JJ umpire_NN stands_VBZ eight_CD to_TO ten_VB feet_NNS from_IN the_DT batsman_NN and_CC helps_VBZ the_DT other_JJ umpire_NN in_IN his_PRP$ decision_NN making_VBG ._.
One_CD umpire_NN who_WP is_VBZ known_VBN as_IN third_JJ umpire_NN is_VBZ out_IN side_NN the_DT ground_NN When_WRB the_DT need_NN arises_VBZ help_NN can_MD be_VB asked_VBN from_IN the_DT third_JJ umpire_NN &#44;_CD third_JJ umpire_NN helps_VBZ the_DT umpires_NNS with_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN television_NN ._.
Another_DT umpire_NN is_VBZ the_DT match_NN referee_NN who_WP &#39;_CD s_PRP job_NN is_VBZ to_TO ensure_VB that_IN players_NNS follow_VBP the_DT laws_NNS of_IN the_DT game_NN If_IN the_DT players_NNS break_VBP the_DT rules_NNS or_CC code_NN of_IN conduct_NN of_IN the_DT game_NN &#44;_CD the_DT referee_NN can_MD post_VB fines_NNS on_IN them_PRP The_DT scorers_NNS job_NN is_VBZ to_TO count_VB both_DT the_DT team_NN &#39;_CD s_VBZ scores_NNS This_DT scorer_NN &#44;_CD records_NNS all_PDT the_DT player_NN &#39;_CD s_PRP individual_JJ score_NN &#44;_CD Overs_NNP and_CC collective_JJ score_NN in_IN a_DT special_JJ book_NN and_CC when_WRB needed_VBN &#44;_CD tells_VBZ the_DT empire_NN ._.
Overview_NNP of_IN Yazid_NNP Muawiya_NNP ._.
The_DT period_NN of_IN Yazid_NNP &#39;_CD s_PRP rule_NN is_VBZ thought_VBN of_IN as_IN a_DT disaster_NN for_IN Muslims_NNPS and_CC his_PRP$ rule_NN is_VBZ still_RB remembered_VBN by_IN many_JJ &#44;_CD especially_RB Shia_NNP Muslims_NNPS ._.
Apart_RB from_IN the_DT severe_JJ criticism_NN by_IN the_DT Shia_NNP groups_NNS and_CC their_PRP$ scholars_NNS &#44;_CD even_RB the_DT people_NNS from_IN the_DT Sunni_NNP sect_NN too_RB had_VBD tough_JJ views_NNS against_IN him_PRP ._.
Overview_NNP of_IN Devbandi_NNP ._.
Devbandi_NNP in_IN ground_NN terms_NNS belongs_VBZ to_TO the_DT Hanifi_NNP school_NN of_IN Muslim_NNP thought_VBD &#44;_CD and_CC his_PRP$ overview_NN is_VBZ different_JJ from_IN individuals_NNS ._.
Most_JJS of_IN the_DT Deobandis_NNP have_VBP an_DT opposing_VBG view_NN of_IN Yazid_NNP ._.
Some_DT references_NNS are_VBP given_VBN below_IN Famous_NNP Deobandi_NNP scholar_NN Maulana_NNP Qasim_NNP Nanootwi_NNP gave_VBD Yazeed_NNP the_DT title_NN of_IN a_DT filth_NN This_DT word_NN also_RB used_VBN by_IN Maulana_NNP Rasheed_NNP Ahmed_NNP Ghanghawi_NNP Maulana_NNP Ashraf_NNP Ali_NNP thanwi_NN opposed_VBD Yazeed_NNP and_CC called_VBD him_PRP Fasiq_NNP Distinguished_NNP Deobandi_NNP 1905_CD was_VBD the_DT year_NN of_IN achievements_NNS In_IN this_DT year_NN &#44;_CD Einstein_NNP had_VBD published_VBN four_CD famous_JJ scientific_JJ theories_NNS ._.
First_NNP dissertation_NN was_VBD about_IN the_DT nature_NN of_IN light_JJ Second_JJ one_NN was_VBD Brownian_JJ motion_NN which_WDT was_VBD lacking_VBG a_DT satisfactory_JJ explanation_NN and_CC hard_JJ to_TO understand_VB ._.
Einstein_NNP noted_VBD that_IN the_DT photoelectric_JJ effect_NN depended_VBD on_IN the_DT wavelength_NN &#44;_CD and_CC hence_RB the_DT frequency_NN of_IN the_DT light_NN ._.
The_DT theory_NN of_IN light_NN was_VBD first_JJ presented_VBN by_IN Max_NNP Planck_NNP ._.
Second_JJ dissertation_NN was_VBD the_DT mathematical_JJ model_NN of_IN Brownian_JJ motion_NN in_IN which_WDT with_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN light_JJ the_DT motion_NN of_IN particles_NNS in_IN liquid_NN was_VBD interpreted_VBN ._.

Most_JJS importantly_RB &#44;_CD the_DT theory_NN was_VBD supported_VBN by_IN an_DT ever-increasing_JJ body_NN of_IN confirmatory_JJ experimental_JJ evidence_NN ._.

However_RB &#44;_CD the_DT speed_NN of_IN light_NN would_MD be_VB the_DT same_JJ -LRB-_-LRB- approximately_RB -RRB-_-RRB- for_IN all_DT observers_NNS ._.

And_CC no_DT experiment_NN is_VBZ possible_JJ in_IN an_DT inertial_JJ frame_NN of_IN reference_NN moving_VBG with_IN uniform_JJ velocity_NN &#44;_CD with_IN which_WDT the_DT observer_NN present_NN in_IN that_DT inertial_JJ frame_NN of_IN reference_NN could_MD determine_VB whether_IN he_PRP &#39;_CD s_PRP moving_VBG with_IN uniform_JJ velocity_NN or_CC is_VBZ ``_`` stationary_JJ or_CC at_IN rest_NN ''_'' ._.

In_IN other_JJ words_NNS &#44;_VBP the_DT laws_NNS of_IN physics_NN equally_RB apply_VB to_TO all_DT of_IN the_DT non-accelerated_JJ initial_JJ frames_NNS of_IN reference_NN ._.

The_DT structure_NN of_IN Canada_NNP is_VBZ distinct_JJ and_CC unique_JJ system_NN in_IN the_DT world_NN ._.

Category_NN :_: Languages_NNS Even_RB if_IN conditions_NNS become_VBP suitable_JJ for_IN price_NN reductions_NNS &#44;_CD prices_NNS still_RB don_VBP &#39;_CD t_JJ easily_RB reduce_VB as_IN they_PRP increase_VBP ._.

Cairns_NNP &#39;_CD Economics_NNP propagates_VBZ a_DT Mixed_NNP Economy_NNP in_IN lieu_NN of_IN Free_NNP Economy_NNP and_CC Controlled_NNP Economy_NNP &#44;_CD in_IN which_WDT the_DT government_NN institutions_NNS and_CC private_JJ sector_NN both_DT play_VBP their_PRP$ role_NN ._.
In_IN contrast_NN with_IN the_DT classical_JJ economic_JJ ideals_NNS &#44;_CD these_DT people_NNS do_VBP not_RB believe_VB that_IN the_DT economy_NN would_MD automatically_RB generate_VB employment_NN and_CC stability_NN ._.
The_DT basic_JJ source_NN of_IN such_JJ ideals_NNS is_VBZ Cairns_NNP &#39;_CD famous_JJ book_NN &#44;_CD General_NNP Theory_NNP ._.
Economic_NNP ideologies_NNS of_IN Marx_NNP The_NNP bases_NNS of_IN Marxist_JJ economics_NNS are_VBP the_DT ideologies_NNS of_IN Karl_NNP Marx_NNP &#44;_CD which_WDT were_VBD basically_RB ;_: his_PRP$ famous_JJ book_NN &#39;_CD Sarmaya_NNP &#39;_CD -LRB-_-LRB- Das_NNP Kapital_NNP in_IN German_NNP Marks_NNP used_VBD to_TO see_VB these_DT problems_NNS with_IN the_DT eye_NN of_IN class_NN disparities_NNS ._.
In_IN his_PRP$ opinion_NN in_IN Capitalistic_JJ system_NN there_EX is_VBZ not_RB a_DT fair_JJ division_NN of_IN wealth_NN and_CC production_NN among_IN labor_NN and_CC capital_NN and_CC investor_NN exploits_NNS labors_NNS and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ the_DT base_NN for_IN status_NN or_CC class_NN disparity_NN ._.
The_DT basis_NN of_IN these_DT thoughts_NNS is_VBZ on_IN labor_NN theory_NN of_IN value_NN according_VBG to_TO which_WDT the_DT price_NN tags_NNS or_CC values_NNS on_IN the_DT products_NNS and_CC determined_VBN by_IN the_DT labor_NN used_VBN to_TO produce_VB them_PRP ._.
The_DT hard_JJ work_NN of_IN labor_NN induces_VBZ value_NN in_IN goods_NNS and_CC their_PRP$ fair_JJ part_NN is_VBZ not_RB obtained_VBN and_CC most_JJS of_IN the_DT share_NN of_IN production_NN and_CC profit_NN is_VBZ taken_VBN by_IN the_DT investor_NN or_CC entrepreneur_NN ._.

The_DT diameter_NN of_IN the_DT ground_NN ranges_VBZ between_IN 450_CD feet_NNS -LRB-_-LRB- 137_CD yards_NNS -RRB-_-RRB- and_CC 500_CD feet_NNS -LRB-_-LRB- 150_CD yards_NNS -RRB-_-RRB- The_DT boundary_NN limit_NN is_VBZ generally_RB marked_VBN with_IN rope_NN ._.
The_DT middle_JJ area_NN of_IN the_DT ground_NN where_WRB the_DT batting_NN and_CC bowling_NN takes_VBZ place_NN is_VBZ called_VBN the_DT pitch_NN ._.
Its_PRP$ length_NN according_VBG to_TO rules_NNS is_VBZ 66_CD feet_NNS -LRB-_-LRB- 12.20_CD yards_NNS -RRB-_-RRB- 12_CD meter_NN and_CC width_NN 10_CD feet_NNS In_IN both_DT sides_NNS of_IN the_DT pitch_NN three_CD wooden_JJ nailed_VBD sticks_NNS are_VBP fixed_VBN in_IN the_DT ground_NN which_WDT are_VBP called_VBN stumps_NNS in_IN English_NNP ._.
These_DT stumps_NNS and_CC bales_NNS are_VBP combined_VBN as_IN wickets_NNS the_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT wicket_NN where_WRB batsmen_NNS is_VBZ playing_VBG is_VBZ called_VBN batting_NN end_NN in_IN English_NNP And_CC from_IN the_DT opposite_JJ end_NN from_IN where_WRB the_DT bowler_NN throws_VBZ the_DT ball_NN is_VBZ called_VBN bowling_NN end_NN in_IN English_NNP and_CC also_RB called_VBN bowling_NN part_NN ._.
Umpire_NNP stands_VBZ on_IN the_DT same_JJ area_NN on_IN the_DT outer_JJ part_NN of_IN the_DT pitch_NN ._.
The_DT side_NN of_IN the_DT ground_NN towards_IN which_WDT side_NN the_DT batsman_NN keeps_VBZ his_PRP$ bat_NN is_VBZ called_VBN off_RP side_NN in_IN English_NNP and_CC the_DT other_JJ part_NN of_IN the_DT ground_NN on_IN opposite_JJ side_NN where_WRB the_DT batsman_NN &#39;_CD s_PRP legs_NNS and_CC back_RB face_NN is_VBZ called_VBN on_RP side_NN ._.
The_DT while_IN line_NN over_IN pitch_NN is_VBZ known_VBN as_IN crease_NN ._.
These_DT lines_NNS help_VBP the_DT umpire_NN in_IN making_VBG decision_NN about_IN out_RB or_CC unfair_JJ runs_NNS ._.
Parts_NNS of_IN the_DT Ground_NN ._.
Cricket_NN ground_NN is_VBZ divided_VBN into_IN two_CD parts_NNS Around_IN wicket_NN it_PRP is_VBZ 30_CD yards_NNS A_DT circle_NN is_VBZ drawn_VBN at_IN the_DT distance_NN of_IN 4_CD meters_NNS it_PRP is_VBZ called_VBN as_RB in-field_JJ or_CC inscribed_JJ circle_NN ._.
On_IN both_DT sides_NNS of_IN the_DT pitch_NN &#44;_CD at_IN a_DT distance_NN of_IN 15_CD yards_NNS from_IN the_DT center_NN of_IN the_DT earth_NN a_DT circle_NN is_VBZ drawn_VBN which_WDT is_VBZ called_VBN as_RB near_IN inner_JJ circle_NN or_CC close_JJ in-field_NN ._.
This_DT circle_NN usually_RB comes_VBZ into_IN play_NN in_IN one_CD day_NN matches_VBZ ._.
With_IN the_DT help_NN of_IN this_DT the_DT captain_NN places_VBZ players_NNS inside_IN the_DT circle_NN for_IN catch_NN in_IN first_JJ 15_CD overs_NNS of_IN the_DT match_NN which_WDT is_VBZ necessary_JJ according_VBG to_TO the_DT laws_NNS of_IN cricket_NN ._.
The_DT fielding_NN spots_NNS in_IN the_DT field_NN Players_NNS in_IN the_DT field_NN Two_CD players_NNS from_IN the_DT batting_NN side_NN will_MD be_VB present_JJ always_RB at_IN the_DT time_NN of_IN match_NN ._.
The_DT player_NN who_WP stands_VBZ in_IN front_NN of_IN the_DT bowler_NN is_VBZ known_VBN as_IN striker_NN ._.
his_PRP$ other_JJ partner_NN who_WP is_VBZ on_IN the_DT other_JJ side_NN of_IN the_DT wicket_NN is_VBZ called_VBN the_DT non_NN striker_NN the_DT fielding_NN team_NN has_VBZ 11_CD players_NNS on_IN the_DT ground_NN at_IN all_DT times_NNS One_CD of_IN these_DT players_NNS will_MD do_VB bowling_NN ._.
One_CD player_NN who_WP stands_VBZ behind_IN the_DT bats_NNS man_NN is_VBZ called_VBN wicket_NN keeper_NN these_DT 9_CD players_NNS are_VBP called_VBN the_DT fielders_NNS One_CD player_NN will_MD be_VB the_DT vice_NN captain_NN and_CC in_IN the_DT absence_NN of_IN the_DT captain_NN he_PRP will_MD act_VB as_IN a_DT captain_NN ._.
Rules_NNS for_IN playing_VBG game_NN Before_IN the_DT start_NN of_IN match_NN captains_NNS of_IN both_DT teams_NNS throw_VBP coin_NN in_IN air_NN &#44;_CD this_DT process_NN is_VBZ call_JJ Toss_NNP Captain_NNP who_WP won_VBD the_DT toss_VBP decides_VBZ whether_IN to_TO bat_NN or_CC bowl_NN Captain_NN makes_VBZ this_DT decision_NN according_VBG to_TO weather_VB and_CC pitch_VB ._.
In_IN a_DT cricket_NN match_NN Toss_VBP &#44;_CD Pitch_NNP and_CC weather_NN are_VBP very_RB important_JJ Captain_NNP and_CC coach_NN decide_VBP by_IN taking_VBG into_IN account_NN all_DT these_DT three_CD things_NNS ._.
each_DT inning_NN is_VBZ divided_VBN in_IN overs_NNS ._.
As_IN a_DT result_NN of_IN wide_JJ or_CC no_DT ball_NN bowler_NN has_VBZ to_TO ball_NN those_DT deliveries_NNS again_RB ._.
At_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT over_IN the_DT other_JJ bowler_NN bowls_VBZ from_IN the_DT other_JJ side_NN of_IN the_DT wicket_NN ._.
Every_DT bowler_NN sets_VBZ his_PRP$ field_NN according_VBG to_TO his_PRP$ bowling_NN At_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN every_DT over_IN &#44;_CD Umpires_NNP too_RB change_VBP their_PRP$ positions_NNS ._.
Innings_NNS finishes_NNS due_JJ to_TO 5_CD different_JJ reasons_NNS :_: Out_IN of_IN eleven_JJ &#44;_CD ten_NN players_NNS are_VBP out_RB ._.
When_WRB only_RB 1_CD batsman_NN is_VBZ left_VBN for_IN batting_NN &#44;_CD i.e._FW the_DT remaining_VBG players_NNS can_MD not_RB bat_NN for_IN some_DT reason_NN In_IN the_DT end_NN the_DT batting_NN side_NN team_NN meets_VBZ the_DT target_NN -LRB-_-LRB- score_NN -RRB-_-RRB- to_TO win_VB ._.
When_WRB the_DT total_JJ overs_NNS have_VBP finished_VBN -LRB-_-LRB- only_RB in_IN one_CD day_NN internationals_NNS :_: when_WRB 50_CD overs_NNS have_VBP been_VBN bowled_VBN -RRB-_-RRB- When_WRB the_DT captain_NN declares_VBZ or_CC finishes_VBZ his_PRP$ innings_NNS One_CD test_NN match_NN is_VBZ commonly_RB played_VBN for_IN three_CD or_CC five_CD days_NNS ._.
Everyday_JJ play_NN commonly_RB continues_VBZ for_IN seven_CD to_TO eight_CD hours_NNS ._.

An_DT one_CD day_NN match_NN continues_VBZ for_IN near_IN about_IN seven_CD to_TO eight_CD hours_NNS ._.
Usually_RB the_DT match_NN will_MD be_VB played_VBN during_IN the_DT day_NN time_NN but_CC if_IN the_DT light_NN is_VBZ bad_JJ then_RB the_DT match_NN will_MD be_VB stop_VB ._.
Test_NN matches_NNS are_VBP always_RB played_VBN during_IN the_DT day_NN ._.
But_CC one_CD day_NN match_NN can_MD also_RB be_VB often_RB played_VBN during_IN the_DT night_NN under_IN the_DT lights_NNS but_CC only_RB in_IN that_DT case_NN where_WRB appropriate_JJ light_NN is_VBZ available_JJ ._.
Cricket_NN is_VBZ mostly_RB played_VBN in_IN an_DT open_JJ field_NN ._.
The_DT batting_NN style_NN of_IN Pakistani_NNP batsman_NN Mohammad_NNP Yusuf_NNP Batsman_NNP try_VBP to_TO hit_VB the_DT ball_NN with_IN the_DT plane_NN side_NN of_IN the_DT bat_NN &#44;_CD if_IN the_DT ball_NN touches_NNS the_DT bat_NN on_IN its_PRP$ corner_NN and_CC passes_VBZ then_RB it_PRP is_VBZ called_VBN edge_NN or_CC corner_NN ball_NN It_PRP is_VBZ not_RB necessary_JJ for_IN a_DT batsman_NN to_TO hit_VB every_DT ball_NN or_CC run_VBN after_RB hitting_VBG the_DT ball_NN The_DT batsman_NN automatically_RB gets_VBZ six_CD or_CC four_CD runs_NNS if_IN he_PRP sends_VBZ the_DT bowl_NN out_IN of_IN the_DT field_NN ._.
Four_CD runs_NNS are_VBP given_VBN when_WRB the_DT ball_NN goes_VBZ outside_IN the_DT limit_NN of_IN the_DT circle_NN -LRB-_-LRB- boundary_NN -RRB-_-RRB- with_IN bouncing_VBG and_CC six_CD runs_NNS are_VBP given_VBN when_WRB it_PRP goes_VBZ outside_IN the_DT circle_NN without_IN bouncing_VBG The_DT batsman_NN does_VBZ aggressive_JJ or_CC defensive_JJ batting_NN according_VBG to_TO the_DT strategy_NN of_IN the_DT team_NN ._.
Batsman_NNP come_VB for_IN batting_NN according_VBG to_TO the_DT sequence_NN First_JJ two_CD batsmen_NNS are_VBP called_VBN openers_NNS or_CC inning_NN starters_NNS Initial_JJ batsmen_NNS are_VBP usually_RB very_RB experienced_JJ and_CC expert_NN in_IN batting_NN The_DT batsman_NN who_WP come_VBP after_IN number_NN 3_CD is_VBZ considered_VBN to_TO be_VB a_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT middle_JJ order_NN Bowlers_NNP usually_RB come_VBP to_TO bat_NN towards_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT innings_NNS The_DT captain_NN can_MD change_VB the_DT batting_NN order_NN according_VBG to_TO the_DT situation_NN of_IN the_DT match_NN In_IN order_NN to_TO score_VB a_DT single_JJ &#44;_CD the_DT batsman_NN runs_VBZ from_IN one_CD end_NN of_IN the_DT wicket_NN to_TO the_DT other_JJ In_IN order_NN to_TO complete_VB the_DT run_NN &#44;_CD both_DT batsman_NN have_VBP to_TO be_VB in_IN their_PRP$ respective_JJ creases_NNS Batsman_NNP can_MD make_VB more_JJR than_IN one_CD run_NN from_IN one_CD hit_NN But_CC unlike_IN baseball_NN it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB necessary_JJ for_IN the_DT batsmen_NNS to_TO hit_VB the_DT ball_NN or_CC run_VBN after_RB hitting_VBG the_DT ball_NN ._.
The_DT batsman_NN keeps_VBZ the_DT bat_NN in_IN hand_NN while_IN running_VBG If_IN the_DT opposing_VBG teams_NNS fielder_JJR removes_VBZ the_DT bails_NNS from_IN the_DT wicket_NN with_IN the_DT ball_NN before_IN the_DT batsman_NN reaches_VBZ his_PRP$ ground_NN &#44;_CD then_RB he_PRP is_VBZ considered_VBN to_TO be_VB run_VBN out_RP In_IN this_DT situation_NN &#44;_CD the_DT batsman_NN closer_RBR to_TO the_DT disturbed_JJ wicket_NN is_VBZ considered_VBN to_TO be_VB out_RB ._.
In_IN order_NN to_TO complete_VB the_DT run_NN &#44;_CD the_DT batsmans_NNS bat_NN or_CC any_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT body_NN has_VBZ to_TO have_VB crossed_VBN the_DT line_NN and_CC be_VB on_IN the_DT ground_NN Decisions_NNS like_IN these_DT are_VBP mostly_RB made_VBN by_IN the_DT third_JJ umpire_NN As_IN a_DT result_NN of_IN hitting_VBG the_DT ball_NN out_IN of_IN the_DT boundary_NN &#44;_CD the_DT batsman_NN will_MD be_VB getting_VBG either_DT four_CD or_CC six_CD runs_NNS ._.
When_WRB the_DT ball_NN crosses_VBZ the_DT boundary_NN after_IN bouncing_VBG on_IN the_DT ground_NN first_RB &#44;_CD 4_CD runs_NNS are_VBP gained_VBN ._.
When_WRB the_DT ball_NN crosses_VBZ the_DT boundary_NN without_IN bouncing_VBG on_IN the_DT ground_NN &#44;_CD 6_CD runs_NNS are_VBP gained_VBN ._.
Every_DT run_NN scored_VBN by_IN the_DT batsman_NN will_MD be_VB included_VBN in_IN the_DT team_NN &#39;_CD s_VBZ total_NN ._.
Extra_JJ runs_NNS such_JJ as_IN no_DT balls_NNS and_CC wide_JJ balls_NNS are_VBP also_RB added_VBN to_TO the_DT teams_NNS total_VBP runs_NNS Pakistan_NNP &#39;_CD s_PRP bowler_JJR Wasim_NNP Akram_NNP &#44;_CD while_IN bowling_VBG Bowling_NNP and_CC getting_VBG wickets_NNS For_IN additional_JJ information_NN &#44;_CD see_VBP :_: Bowling_NNP The_NNP aim_NN of_IN bowler_NN is_VBZ to_TO out_IN the_DT batsman_NN at_IN lowest_JJS possible_JJ runs_NNS ._.
The_DT bowler_NN swings_VBZ his_PRP$ arm_NN during_IN bowling_NN and_CC bangs_VBZ the_DT ball_NN on_IN the_DT ground_NN after_IN rolling_VBG the_DT ball_NN over_IN his_PRP$ shoulder_NN ._.
Except_IN run-out_JJ &#44;_CD all_DT other_JJ outs_NNS will_MD be_VB credited_VBN to_TO the_DT bowler_NN ._.
The_DT bowler_NN bowls_VBZ the_DT ball_NN according_VBG to_TO his_PRP$ strategy_NN ._.
At_IN the_DT same_JJ time_NN &#44;_CD it_PRP is_VBZ important_JJ to_TO maintain_VB the_DT line_NN and_CC length_NN while_IN bowling_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ easy_JJ to_TO get_VB out_RP an_DT inexperienced_JJ player_NN as_IN compared_VBN to_TO experienced_JJ one_CD ._.
There_EX are_VBP different_JJ types_NNS of_IN bowlers_NNS ._.
This_DT is_VBZ divided_VBN into_IN two_CD parts_NNS One_CD who_WP runs_VBZ very_RB fast_RB from_IN back_RB he_PRP is_VBZ known_VBN as_IN fast_JJ bowler_NN or_CC bowler_NN ._.
And_CC second_JJ those_DT who_WP bowl_VBP slowly_RB and_CC turn_VB the_DT ball_NN ._.
They_PRP are_VBP called_VBN spinners_NNS Batsman_NNP can_MD be_VB out_RB in_IN 10_CD ways_NNS when_WRB one_CD batsman_NN gets_VBZ out_RP &#44;_RB he_PRP leaves_VBZ the_DT ground_NN and_CC in_IN his_PRP$ place_NN another_DT batsman_NN comes_VBZ the_DT batsman_NN can_MD get_VB out_RP in_IN these_DT 10_CD ways_NNS ._.
Of_IN these_DT &#44;_CD the_DT first_JJ six_CD are_VBP common_JJ &#44;_CD the_DT remaining_VBG 4_CD are_VBP unusual_JJ and_CC not_RB commonly_RB seen_VBN Catch_NNP ..._: when_WRB the_DT fielder_NN catches_VBZ the_DT ball_NN before_IN it_PRP hits_VBZ the_DT ground_NN and_CC after_IN it_PRP has_VBZ hit_VBN the_DT batsmans_NNS bat_NN or_CC glove_NN Bowled_NNP --_: When_WRB the_DT ball_NN drops_VBZ the_DT two_CD bails_NNS present_JJ over_IN the_DT striker_NN batsman_NN &#39;_CD s_VBZ wickets_NNS ._.
The_DT ball_NN can_MD hit_VB the_DT wickets_NNS directly_RB or_CC off_RB the_DT bat_NN or_CC any_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT body_NN This_DT wicket_NN is_VBZ given_VBN to_TO the_DT bowler_NN LBW_SYM -_: Leg_NN before_IN Wicket_NNP ..._: When_WRB the_DT ball_NN hits_VBZ the_DT batsman_NN on_IN the_DT leg_NN without_IN hitting_VBG the_DT bat_NN &#44;_CD when_WRB the_DT batsman_NN &#39;_CD s_VBZ leg_NN is_VBZ in_IN front_NN of_IN the_DT wicket_NN And_CC it_PRP feels_VBZ that_IN the_DT ball_NN would_MD go_VB on_IN to_TO hit_VB the_DT wicket_NN ._.
This_DT decision_NN is_VBZ made_VBN by_IN the_DT umpire_NN For_IN this_DT &#44;_CD it_PRP is_VBZ necessary_JJ that_IN the_DT ball_NN does_VBZ not_RB strike_VB the_DT leg_NN side_NN or_CC outside_IN the_DT batsman_NN &#39;_CD s_VBZ leg_NN ._.
If_IN the_DT batsman_NN is_VBZ not_RB offering_VBG a_DT shot_NN and_CC the_DT ball_NN strikes_VBZ the_DT batsman_NN &#39;_CD s_VBZ leg_NN without_IN touching_VBG the_DT bat_NN &#44;_CD then_RB the_DT batsman_NN could_MD be_VB given_VBN out_RP even_RB if_IN his_PRP$ leg_NN is_VBZ not_RB in_IN front_NN of_IN the_DT wicket_NN ._.
This_DT wicket_NN is_VBZ given_VBN to_TO the_DT bowler_NN Run_NNP Out_IN --_: When_WRB a_DT fielder_NN drops_VBZ the_DT bail_NN with_IN the_DT ball_NN before_IN the_DT batsman_NN reaches_VBZ his_PRP$ crease_NN while_IN taking_VBG a_DT run_NN &#44;_CD then_RB it_PRP is_VBZ called_VBN a_DT Run_NNP Out_IN ._.
If_IN the_DT fielders_NNS hits_VBZ the_DT wicket_NN with_IN the_DT ball_NN it_PRP is_VBZ compulsory_JJ for_IN the_DT ball_NN to_TO be_VB in_IN his_PRP$ hand_NN But_CC the_DT name_NN of_IN the_DT fielder_NN is_VBZ written_VBN on_IN the_DT score_NN card_NN in_IN brackets_NNS ._.
Stumped_NNP ..._: When_WRB the_DT batsman_NN leaves_VBZ his_PRP$ crease_NN in_IN trying_VBG to_TO hit_VB the_DT ball_NN and_CC in_IN this_DT time_NN -LRB-_-LRB- the_DT batsman_NN is_VBZ unable_JJ to_TO get_VB back_RB into_IN his_PRP$ crease_NN -RRB-_-RRB- and_CC the_DT wicket_NN keeper_NN hit_VBD the_DT wickets_NNS with_IN the_DT ball_NN In_IN this_DT time_NN if_IN the_DT batsman_NN is_VBZ in_IN the_DT crease_NN but_CC his_PRP$ foot_NN is_VBZ in_IN the_DT air_NN &#44;_CD even_RB then_RB he_PRP is_VBZ out_IN Only_RB a_DT wicket_NN keeper_NN can_MD do_VB a_DT stumping_VBG This_DT wicket_NN will_MD be_VB credited_VBN to_TO both_DT bowler_NN and_CC wicket_NN keeper_NN ._.
Hit_VBD Wicket_NNP ..._: When_WRB the_DT batsman_NN removes_VBZ the_DT bail_NN from_IN the_DT wicket_NN either_RB with_IN his_PRP$ body_NN or_CC his_PRP$ bat_NN &#44;_CD either_CC while_IN trying_VBG to_TO hit_VB the_DT ball_NN or_CC while_IN running_VBG This_DT wicket_NN is_VBZ given_VBN to_TO the_DT bowler_NN Handle_VB the_DT ball_NN ..._: When_WRB the_DT batsman_NN &#44;_CD while_IN playing_VBG the_DT ball_NN or_CC after_IN having_VBG played_VBN the_DT ball_NN holds_VBZ the_DT ball_NN without_IN the_DT permission_NN of_IN the_DT other_JJ team_NN This_DT wicket_NN is_VBZ not_RB given_VBN to_TO anyone_NN Hit_VBD the_DT ball_NN twice_RB --_: When_WRB the_DT batsmen_NNS hit_VBD the_DT ball_NN twice_RB intentionally_RB ._.
this_DT wicket_NN is_VBZ not_RB given_VBN to_TO any_DT bowler_NN this_DT wicket_NN is_VBZ not_RB given_VBN to_TO any_DT bowler_NN Time_NN out_IN ..._: when_WRB the_DT incoming_JJ batsman_NN takes_VBZ more_JJR than_IN 3_CD minutes_NNS to_TO get_VB onto_IN the_DT field_NN of_IN play_NN after_IN the_DT dismissal_NN of_IN a_DT batsman_NN &#44;_CD the_DT umpire_NN can_MD give_VB him_PRP out_RP This_DT authority_NN lies_VBZ with_IN the_DT Umpire_NNP if_IN he_PRP thinks_VBZ that_IN other_JJ team_NN is_VBZ trying_VBG to_TO waste_VB time_NN this_DT wicket_NN is_VBZ not_RB written_VBN in_IN anybody_NN &#39;_CD s_VBZ name_NN ._.
batsman_NN can_MD leave_VB the_DT ground_NN without_IN being_VBG out_RP only_RB on_IN the_DT condition_NN that_IN he_PRP can_MD not_RB bat_NN anymore_RB ._.
this_DT is_VBZ written_VBN as_IN retired_VBN in_IN score_NN card_NN ._.

If_IN that_DT batsman_NN can_MD not_RB come_VB for_IN batting_NN he_PRP is_VBZ declared_VBN out_RP This_DT wicket_NN is_VBZ also_RB not_RB noted_VBN in_IN anybody_NN &#39;_CD s_VBZ account_NN ._.
The_DT batsmen_NNS can_MD not_RB get_VB out_RP on_IN No_DT Ball_NNP except_IN for_IN run_VBN out_RP ._.
On_IN wide_JJ ball_NN batsman_NN can_MD not_RB be_VB given_VBN caught_VBN out_RP or_CC LBW_NNP Australian_NNP Wicket_NNP Keeper_NNP Adam_NNP Gilchrist_NNP ._.
The_DT fielder_NN helps_VBZ the_DT bowler_NN in_IN getting_VBG the_DT wicket_NN or_CC to_TO stop_VB runs_NNS ._.
The_DT fielder_NN can_MD stop_VB the_DT ball_NN with_IN any_DT part_NN of_IN his_PRP$ body_NN ._.
But_CC in_IN order_NN to_TO get_VB the_DT batsman_NN one_NN can_MD catch_VB the_DT ball_NN with_IN hands_NNS only_RB In_IN cricket_NN the_DT fielders_NNS can_MD not_RB wear_VB gloves_NNS on_IN hands_NNS ._.
Only_RB wicket_NN keeper_NN can_MD wear_VB gloves_NNS on_IN hands_NNS ._.
These_DT gloves_NNS are_VBP specially_RB made_VBN for_IN the_DT wicket_NN keeper_NN ._.
And_CC only_RB wicket_NN keeper_NN can_MD wear_VB pads_NNS on_IN legs_NNS for_IN safety_NN ._.
These_DT pads_NNS are_VBP usually_RB smaller_JJR than_IN the_DT pads_NNS of_IN batsman_NN Captain_NNP plays_VBZ an_DT important_JJ role_NN in_IN the_DT team_NN ._.
To_TO prepare_VB the_DT strategy_NN of_IN the_DT team_NN &#44;_CD to_TO change_VB the_DT bowlers_NNS &#44;_CD to_TO place_VB the_DT fielders_NNS at_IN correct_JJ place_NN means_VBZ all_DT important_JJ decisions_NNS are_VBP the_DT responsibilities_NNS of_IN captain_NN ._.

Emigrants_NNS from_IN Poland_NNP During_IN the_DT war_NN &#44;_CD from_IN 1.8_CD million_CD to_TO 2.1_CD million_CD non_NN Jewish_JJ citizens_NNS of_IN Poland_NNP were_VBD killed_VBN &#44;_CD in_IN which_WDT 80_CD %_NN were_VBD Poland_NNP inhabitants_NNS and_CC the_DT remaining_VBG 20_CD %_NN were_VBD the_DT minorities_NNS who_WP came_VBD from_IN Ukraine_NNP and_CC Belarus_NNP ._.
And_CC most_JJS of_IN them_PRP were_VBD common_JJ citizens_NNS ._.
Nearly_RB 200_CD &#44;_CD 000_CD deaths_NNS were_VBD in_IN different_JJ camps_NNS &#44;_CD of_IN which_WDT 140_CD &#44;_CD 000_CD were_VBD in_IN jewish_JJ camps_NNS Most_JJS of_IN the_DT killings_NNS took_VBD place_NN in_IN general_JJ massacre_NN &#44;_CD like_IN during_IN rebellion_NN of_IN Warsaw_NNP 120_CD &#44;_CD 000_CD to_TO 200_CD &#44;_CD 000_CD general_JJ citizens_NNS were_VBD killed_VBN ._.
After_IN which_WDT the_DT death_NN rate_NN increased_VBN from_IN 13_CD %_NN to_TO 18_CD %_NN in_IN Poland_NNP A_NNP total_NN of_IN 5.1_CD million_CD Polish_JJ people_NNS were_VBD killed_VBN at_IN the_DT hand_NN of_IN Nazi_NNP &#39;_CD s_PRP Which_WDT included_VBD both_DT Jews_NNPS and_CC Non-Jews_NNPS &#44;_CD i.e._FW according_VBG to_TO the_DT census_NN before_IN the_DT war_NN &#44;_CD Poland_NNP had_VBD lost_VBN its_PRP$ 16_CD %_NN of_IN the_DT population_NN because_IN the_DT damages_NNS in_IN Poland_NNP during_IN the_DT war_NN ._.

Like_IN on_IN 19_CD September_NNP &#44;_CD 1942_CD three_CD thousand_CD men_NNS and_CC women_NNS were_VBD caught_VBN through_IN this_DT practice_NN &#44;_CD they_PRP were_VBD made_VBN to_TO move_VB around_RB in_IN the_DT whole_JJ Warsaw_NNP and_CC by_IN the_DT train_NN were_VBD sent_VBN to_TO Germany_NNP Apart_RB from_IN that_DT &#44;_CD approximately_RB 20_CD &#44;_CD 000_CD to_TO 200_CD &#44;_CD 000_CD people_NNS were_VBD given_VBN the_DT same_JJ treatment_NN ._.
